titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, Student Records
Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, Student Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:06

did.unittitle: Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, student records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of student files and dean's files documenting academic performance of students in the Yale Sheffield Scientific School.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 31-F (YRG 31-F), Student records of the Sheffield Scientific School.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, Student Records (RU 709). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of student files and dean's files documenting academic performance of students in the Yale Sheffield Scientific School.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

did.unittitle: Student records for the classes of 1921-1955

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: No online inventory available. Paper inventory available in repository.

did.unittitle: Student records for the classes of 1918-1963

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: No online inventory available. Paper inventory available in repository.

Conditions and warnings for the Class of 1915

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
